userreviews.userReview: Excellent book...signs are illustrated and easy to understand. Actually incorporated several for use with friends...works well when you want to say something silently.
Very interesting, especially to those into the history of plains tribes of North America.
Indian Sign LanguageTomkins, Williamrequired text for college courses on native american traditions, it looks at the historical record of trade sign language

description: Learn to communicate without words with these authentic signs! Learn over 525 signs developed by the Sioux, Blackfoot, Cheyenne, Arapahoe, and other tribes. Written instructions and diagrams show you how to make the words and construct sentences. Book also contains 290 pictographs (language in pictures) of the Sioux and Ojibway tribes.
title: Indian Sign Language (Native American)
